attributes.action: call an immediate General Election upon the transition to a new Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We note the impending resignation of the Prime Minister, Rt Hon Tony Blair. Whilst we understand that as currently stands it is both precedented and legitimate for a member of the governing party to take over the duties of Prime Minister upon resignation of their predecessor, but we call upon any Prime Minister to 'earn' their mandate via General Election. 

With the election of a new leader comes a new direction and new ideas, none of which have been tried or tested by the British public in a fair and democratic election. How can this be in a modern democracy?
